Flow.description: Stamp the first and most recent call/text/activity date fields

formulas.name: FirstTextDateOnAccount
formulas.expression: IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} )), NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account.CreatedDate} )), {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} < {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account.CreatedDate} ), {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c}, IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} )), NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account.CreatedDate} )), {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} > {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account.CreatedDate} ), {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account.CreatedDate}, IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} )), ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account.CreatedDate} ) ), {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c}, IF( AND( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} ), NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account.CreatedDate} )) ), {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account.CreatedDate}, {!Get_Task.CreatedDate} ))))

formulas.description: To be deleted once heymarket is phased out
formulas.name: FirstTextDateOnAccountFormulaHEYMARKET
formulas.expression: IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account_HEYMARKET.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} )), NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account_HEYMARKET.CreatedDate} )), {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account_HEYMARKET.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} < {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account_HEYMARKET.CreatedDate} ), {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account_HEYMARKET.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c}, IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account_HEYMARKET.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} )), NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account_HEYMARKET.CreatedDate} )), {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account_HEYMARKET.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} > {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account_HEYMARKET.CreatedDate} ), {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account_HEYMARKET.CreatedDate}, IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account_HEYMARKET.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} )), ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account_HEYMARKET.CreatedDate} ) ), {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account_HEYMARKET.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c}, IF( AND( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Account_HEYMARKET.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} ), NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account_HEYMARKET.CreatedDate} )) ), {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Account_HEYMARKET.CreatedDate}, {!Get_Message.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} ))))

formulas.name: FirstTextDateOnLead
formulas.expression: IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Lead.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} )), NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Lead.CreatedDate} )), {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Lead.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} < {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Lead.CreatedDate} ), {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Lead.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c}, IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Lead.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} )), NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Lead.CreatedDate} )), {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Lead.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} > {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Lead.CreatedDate} ), {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Lead.CreatedDate}, IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Lead.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} )), ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Lead.CreatedDate} ) ), {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Lead.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c}, IF( AND( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_Message_on_Lead.heymarket__Created_On_Heymarket__c} ), NOT( ISBLANK( {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Lead.CreatedDate} )) ), {!Get_Oldest_SMS_Task_on_Lead.CreatedDate}, {!Get_Task.CreatedDate} ))))
